title: Woodlawn Duplex w/ yard, W/D in unit, easy commute
neighborhood: Everett South Forest Park, close to amenities
posting_body: Comfortable 700sf,  2 bedroom, 1 bath unit in private duplex, Everett, Central Location.
(Everett, South Forest Park, 98203).
Rambler style home, offering quiet living in a nice residential neighborhood away from the main drag.
Washer & dryer in unit saves time and money.
Well maintained, modernized.
Updates galore.
Excellent central location, quiet, with yard.
Great mother-in-law, MIL, cottage, alternative
Close to amenities, convenient to bus, freeway, Boeing, shopping, Paine Field / PAE,
to YMCA, EvCC / ECC college, Navy / Naval Station, Providence / hospital, waterfront,
and all that Everett has to offer.
near Marysville, Mukilteo, Mill Creek, Lake Stevens.
Walk to bus stop for easy commute to Downtown Everett, Lynnwood, Edmonds,
Shoreline via Bus Rapid Transit - Swift Blue Line on the Evergreen Way Corridor.
Alley access / street parking.
Terms/Requirements
- $1575/month with 12-month lease
- $1575 refundable security deposit
- $60/month/person for water
- Tenant pays own electricity/cable/phone, garbage
- Background check (fee required) for each applicant over 18 years.
- No smoking
- one small pet case by case (fee required)
This home will be available shortly.
Please do not disturb tenants.
Cross street 52nd
St and Woodlawn
This unit is in a private location, and cannot be seen from Woodlawn Ave
I-5 exit Broadway/Everett, head west on 41st Street to Evergreen.
From Evergreen Way go West on 52nd St SE.
Right onto Woodlawn.
Look for street parking.
application fee details: No fee to apply,
only if background check is run.
~$40 per adult.
If interested, please e-mail us answers to the following questions:
(Please cut and paste to include the questions before your answers.)
***** #Woodlawn duplex *****
1) Name:
2) Email and Phone #:
3) Best time to reach you:
4) When do you want to move in?
5) Do you earn at least $5000.00 per month?
6) How long have you been with your current employer?
- If less than 2yr, how long with previous employer?
7) Do you have any criminal, evictions, collections history?
8) Is your credit score 675+ ?
9) Who is included in your household, their relationship to you:
10) Why are you moving?
Thanks, and we look forward to hearing from you!
tbv w1
